name: hosty
description: Hosts file manager based on Electron

scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run build:main; electron main.js
scripts.start:hot: npm run hot:renderer & npm run build:main; HOT=1 electron main.js
scripts.package:mac: NODE_ENV=production npm run build; electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --app-version=`node -pe 'require("./package.json").version'` --app-copyright="© `node -pe '(new Date).getFullYear()'` fiahfy" --out release --ignore release --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=app/assets/img/hosty.icns
scripts.package:win: NODE_ENV=production npm run build; electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --app-version=`node -pe 'require("./package.json").version'` --app-copyright="© `node -pe '(new Date).getFullYear()'` fiahfy" --out release --ignore release --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=app/assets/img/hosty.ico --version-string.FileDescription="Electron application" --version-string.OriginalFilename="Hosty.exe" --version-string.ProductName="Hosty"
scripts.archive: cd release; rm *.zip; ls | xargs -I{} zip -r {}.zip {}
scripts.cmd:start: start /b npm run watch && npm run build:main && electron main.js
scripts.cmd:start:hot: start /b npm run hot:renderer && npm run build:main && set HOT=1 && electron main.js
